((Thinks for the info on mach 1 but I just wanted miles per hour a friend 
showed me a Robotech book so I don't know if the is realistic but mach 1 is 
670 MPH.  Note: What are the effects of a Blade missile and what�s Emp again 
or is it Electro magnetic Pulse?))


::Liono Prime::
Looks at the oncoming attacks "As your leader I'm open for suggestions?"

::Lilly::
"Scatter and cover"

::Liono::
"Works for me break!" Liono drops I down landing on his feet getting hit by 
the blade missile the blast knocks him off his feet and sends his skidding 
as his shoulder sparks. Fire 15 Explosive fireballs at Chaos and fires 10 
more at the 23-laser blast.


::Dark::
Dark fires a plasma bolt at the blue orb and gets hit by the back blast 
landing right next to Liono his armor sparks and charred. Dark fires 24 
plasma bolts at Vehement.

::?4::
Gets out the way of the EMP blast and 3 lasers to get pelted by 10-laser 
blast. His chest plate marred and his wings damaged. ?4 lands right next to 
Liono. ?4 gathers a garnet of electricity and fires 15 Vehement and 10 at 
Minion.

::Koj::
Koj throws the Tetsusiaga.

::Lilly::
Lilly not too concerned about the fireballs relying on her heat shielding 
plates. As the Fire pelts her marring and charring her heat shielding. As 
she staggers back form the force of the blast. As the Fang cuts off the 
Optic blast devouring most of it. The rest of the blast hits Lilly ripping a 
medium sized hole in her shoulder plate. Lilly Fires 25 Exploding Ninja 
stars at Demon Wulf.

::Inu::
Breathes a cone of fire at the 2 seekers coming at Koj. As the back blast 
sends Inu and Koj whirling out of control. Inu-Yasha Terrorize Enters 
Neo-Bahamut mode to stabilize his larger allowing him to stabilize. Then 
fires a cone of Acid and 8 Lancers at Dark Claw.

::Koj::
Koj getting knocked off of Inu-Yasha slamming into a rock breaking giving 
his back some nice dings and nicks. Send two chains to retrieve the 
TenkoLance. Gets a lock on Flesh Ripper and both his shoulder plates open 
and power up. �Tenko Power Blasters!�  Fires 25 rapid fusion bolts at Flesh 
ripper.
